resources.string: Link a bank account so you can send payment, issue refunds, and transfer payment from PayPal to your bank.
Link a Bank Account or Card
Why is my payment on hold\?
All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
You transferred payment to your bank using your %1$s
The payment remains in your PayPal balance.
You\'ll still be able to transfer payment from PayPal to your linked bank, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend at this time.
You\'ll still be able to transfer payment from PayPal to your linked bank, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend at this time.
You\'ll still be able to transfer payment from PayPal to your linked bank, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend at this time.
We\'ll send an email as soon as we\'re done reviewing your docs. This usually takes 2-3 business days.\n\nWhile you\'re waiting you can always transfer the payment to your bank.

Would you like to continue and confirm your identity now\? If you skip this step, you can transfer payment from PayPal to your linked account, but you won\'t be able to use your PayPal balance to send or spend any payment.
